body.p: A timer is a specialized type of clock used for measuring specific time intervals.
Click on the Timer icon on the left navigation toolbar to open the Timer section.
1 minute, 3 minute, 5 minute, 10 minute timers would be present by default. These Timers can be started, reset and edited to customize user needs.

ul.li: Click the play icon Play icon to start the timer of your choice.
Click the Reset icon Reset icon to reset the timer.
Click the Expand icon expand icon to expand the timer view.
Click the Restore icon Restore icon to minimize the expanded view.
Click the Keep on Top Keep on top icon icon to pin the timer to the top of the screen.
In order to edit any of the timers, right click your mouse button over the timer, select "Edit" edit icon and edit it as required.
In order to delete a timer, right click your mouse button over the timer, select "Delete" delete .
In order to add a new timer, click the "Add timer" icon Add icon on the bottom right of the window.
